No se ha conseguido enviar el e-mail.[NEWLINE]Anfitrión SMTP: %s1[NEWLINE]Para: %s2[NEWLINE]De: %s3

TEXT.English: Brings up detailed information about your game's world.
TEXT.French: Informations détaillées sur le monde du jeu.
TEXT.German: Zeigt detaillierte Informationen über Ihre Spielewelt.
TEXT.Italian: Informazioni dettagliate sul mondo della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Hace que aparezca información detallada sobre el mundo de la partida.
TEXT.Russian: Brings up detailed information about your game's world.
TEXT.Japanese: Brings up detailed information about your game's world.
TEXT.Chinese: Brings up detailed information about your game's world.

TEXT.English: Visit www.gamespyid.com to manage your account!
TEXT.French: Visitez le site www.gamespyid.com pour gérer votre compte !
TEXT.German: Besuchen Sie www.gamespyid.com, um Ihren Account zu verwalten.
TEXT.Italian: Mostra informazioni dettagliate sul mondo di gioco (www.gamespyid.com).
TEXT.Spanish: Visita www.gamespyid.com para gestionar tu cuenta.
TEXT.Russian: Visit www.gamespyid.com to manage your account!
TEXT.Japanese: Visit www.gamespyid.com to manage your account!
TEXT.Chinese: Visit www.gamespyid.com to manage your account!

TEXT.English: Toggles display of different trade groups
TEXT.French: Afficher/masquer les différents groupes de commerce.
TEXT.German: Schaltet die Anzeige verschiedener Handelsgruppen ein/aus
TEXT.Italian: Attiva/disattiva la visualizzazione dei diversi gruppi di commercio
TEXT.Spanish: Activa el visor de los diferentes grupos de intercambio
TEXT.Russian: Toggles display of different trade groups
TEXT.Japanese: Toggles display of different trade groups
TEXT.Chinese: Toggles display of different trade groups

TEXT.English: Toggles display of unit position and density information
TEXT.French: Afficher/masquer la position des unités et des informations de densité.
TEXT.German: Schaltet die Anzeige der Einheitenpositionen und -dichte ein/aus
TEXT.Italian: Attiva/disattiva la visualizzazione della posizione e le informazioni sulla densità delle unità
TEXT.Spanish: Activa el visor de la posición de las unidades y de la información de la densidad
TEXT.Russian: Toggles display of unit position and density information
TEXT.Japanese: Toggles display of unit position and density information
TEXT.Chinese: Toggles display of unit position and density information

TEXT.English: Toggles display of religion spread and distribution
TEXT.French: Afficher/masquer la propagation et la distribution des religions.
TEXT.German: Schaltet die Anzeige der Religionsverbreitung und -verteilung ein/aus
TEXT.Italian: Attiva/disattiva la visualizzazione la diffusione e la distribuzione della religione
TEXT.Spanish: Activa el visor de la propagación y distribución de las religiones
TEXT.Russian: Toggles display of religion spread and distribution
TEXT.Japanese: Toggles display of religion spread and distribution
TEXT.Chinese: Toggles display of religion spread and distribution

TEXT.Spanish: Hace que sea más fácil encontrar recursos

TEXT.French: Vous venez d'entrer dans une nouvelle ère (%s1_era) !

TEXT.English: Choose a Folder to Play Music From
TEXT.French: Choisissez le répertoire de lecture de la musique
TEXT.Italian: Scegli la cartella contenente la musica desiderata
TEXT.Spanish: Escoge una carpeta desde donde reproducir la música
TEXT.Russian: Choose a Folder to Play Music From
TEXT.Japanese: Choose a Folder to Play Music From
TEXT.Chinese: Choose a Folder to Play Music From

TEXT.Spanish: [NUM2:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %[s2_UnitName] del %[s1_CivName] (con %[d3]/%[d4] PG) [NUM2:ha alcanzado:ha alcanzado:han alcanzado:han alcanzado] a [NUM6:un:una:unos:unas] %[s6_UnitName] del %[s5_CivName] (con %[d7]/%[d8] PG) y [NUM6:le han infligido:le han infligido:les han infligido:les han infligido] %[d9] de daño.

TEXT.Italian: L'unità %[s2_UnitName] dell'%[s1_CivName] ha sconfitto l'unità %[s4_UnitName] dell'%[s3_CivName]!

TEXT.English: Pan-Gaia: "One Earth," a massive single continent.
TEXT.French: Pan-Gaia: "Une terre", un seul et énorme continent.
TEXT.German: Pangäa: "Eine Erde", ein einziger gewaltiger Kontinent.
TEXT.Spanish: Pan-gea ("una Tierra"), un solo continente enorme.
TEXT.Russian: Pan-Gaia: "One Earth," a massive single continent.
TEXT.Japanese: Pan-Gaia: "One Earth," a massive single continent.
TEXT.Chinese: Pan-Gaia: "One Earth," a massive single continent.

TEXT.English: Randomly generated map with two or more continents.
TEXT.French: Carte générée aléatoirement avec deux continents ou plus.
TEXT.German: Zufällig generierte Karte mit zwei oder mehr Kontinenten.
TEXT.Italian: Genera casualmente una mappa con due o più continenti.
TEXT.Spanish: Mapa generado al azar con dos o más continentes.
TEXT.Russian: Randomly generated map with two or more continents.
TEXT.Japanese: Randomly generated map with two or more continents.
TEXT.Chinese: Randomly generated map with two or more continents.

TEXT.English: The ultimate water map for Civilization IV. Powerful navies not optional!
TEXT.French: La carte marine par excellence pour Civilization IV. Il faudra une flotte puissante !
TEXT.German: Die ultimative Wasserkarte für Civilization IV. Schlagkräftige Marineflotten sind hier ein Muss!
TEXT.Italian: La mappa acquatica definitiva di Civilization IV: una potente flotta navale è d'obbligo!
TEXT.Spanish: El mapa acuático definitivo para Civilization IV. Las armadas poderosas no son opcionales.
TEXT.Russian: The ultimate water map for Civilization IV. Powerful navies not optional!
TEXT.Japanese: The ultimate water map for Civilization IV. Powerful navies not optional!
TEXT.Chinese: The ultimate water map for Civilization IV. Powerful navies not optional!

TEXT.English: Terra generates random land masses similar to those of the planet Earth. All players begin in the Old World. These maps are extra large!
TEXT.French: Des continents similaires à ceux de la Terre sont créés aléatoirement. Tous les joueurs commencent dans l'Antiquité. Ces cartes sont immenses !
TEXT.German: Terra generiert zufällige Landflächen, ähnlich wie die auf dem Planeten Erde. Alle Spieler beginnen zunächst in der Alten Welt. Diese Kartenvarianten sind besonders groß!
TEXT.Italian: Terra genera delle masse terrestri casuali simili a quelle del nostro pianeta. Tutti i giocatori iniziano nel Vecchio Mondo. Queste mappe sono grandissime!
TEXT.Spanish: Terra genera al azar masas de tierra similares a las del planeta Tierra. Todos los jugadores empiezan en el Viejo Mundo. ¡Estos mapas son supergrandes!
TEXT.Russian: Terra generates random land masses similar to those of the planet Earth. All players begin in the Old World. These maps are extra large!
TEXT.Japanese: Terra generates random land masses similar to those of the planet Earth. All players begin in the Old World. These maps are extra large!
TEXT.Chinese: Terra generates random land masses similar to those of the planet Earth. All players begin in the Old World. These maps are extra large!

TEXT.English: Randomly generated world without oceans but dotted by lakes.
TEXT.French: Le monde généré aléatoirement ne contient pas d'océan, uniquement des lacs.
TEXT.German: Zufällig generierte Welt ohne Ozeane, aber mit Seen gespickt.
TEXT.Italian: Genera casualmente una mappa senza oceani, ma con diversi laghi.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mundo generado al azar, sin océanos pero salpicado de lagos.
TEXT.Russian: Randomly generated world without oceans but dotted by lakes.
TEXT.Japanese: Randomly generated world without oceans but dotted by lakes.
TEXT.Chinese: Randomly generated world without oceans but dotted by lakes.

TEXT.English: A random world experiencing severe glaciation. Sea levels have dropped and habitable lands occur only near the equator.
TEXT.French: Un monde aléatoire en pleine glaciation. Le niveau de la mer a baissé et les seules terres habitables se trouvent près de l'équateur.
TEXT.German: Eine zufällig erstellte Welt mit massiven Gletscherlandschaften. Der Meeresspiegel ist abgeflacht, bewohnbare Gebiete gibt es nur in der Nähe des Äquators.
TEXT.Italian: Un mondo casuale in preda a diverse glaciazioni. I livelli del mare sono cresciuti e la terra abitabile si trova soltanto vicino all'equatore.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mundo generado al azar que sufre una grave glaciación. Los niveles del mar han bajado y solo es habitable la tierra próxima al Ecuador.
TEXT.Russian: A random world experiencing severe glaciation. Sea levels have dropped and habitable lands occur only near the equator.
TEXT.Japanese: A random world experiencing severe glaciation. Sea levels have dropped and habitable lands occur only near the equator.
TEXT.Chinese: A random world experiencing severe glaciation. Sea levels have dropped and habitable lands occur only near the equator.

TEXT.English: Randomly generated regional map that loosely simulates the Great Plains heartland of the USA.
TEXT.French: Carte régionale générée aléatoirement et reproduisant vaguement les grandes plaines du centre de l'Amérique du Nord.
TEXT.German: Zufällig generierte, an die amerikanischen Prärielandschaften angelehnte regionale Karte.
TEXT.Italian: Genera casualmente una mappa regionale che simula le grandi pianure centrali degli Stati Uniti.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mapa regional generado al azar que simula la zona interior de las Grandes Llanuras de los EE. UU.
TEXT.Russian: Randomly generated regional map that loosely simulates the Great Plains heartland of the USA.
TEXT.Japanese: Randomly generated regional map that loosely simulates the Great Plains heartland of the USA.
TEXT.Chinese: Randomly generated regional map that loosely simulates the Great Plains heartland of the USA.

TEXT.English: Randomly generated map, simulates a region covered with hills and peaks.
TEXT.French: Carte générée aléatoirement reproduisant une région couverte de montagnes et de collines.
TEXT.Italian: Genera casualmente una mappa che simula una regione collinosa e montuosa.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mapa generado al azar que simula una región plagada de colinas y picos.
TEXT.Russian: Randomly generated map, simulates a region covered with hills and peaks.
TEXT.Japanese: Randomly generated map, simulates a region covered with hills and peaks.
TEXT.Chinese: Randomly generated map, simulates a region covered with hills and peaks.

TEXT.English: The desert region in the middle holds the strategic minerals. The fertile region in the north has less land (but more resources) than the south.
TEXT.French: La région désertique au centre contient toutes les ressources minérales stratégiques. Les fertiles régions du nord sont moins grandes (mais contiennent plus de ressources) que celles du sud.
TEXT.German: In der Wüstenregion in der Mitte der Karte finden sich wichtige strategische Mineralienvorkommen. In der fruchtbaren Region im Norden stehen weniger Landstriche (aber mehr Ressourcen) zur Verfügung als im Süden.
TEXT.Italian: La regione desertica nella zona centrale della mappa contiene le risorse strategiche minerarie. La regione fertile a nord dispone di meno terra ma di più risorse di quella a sud.
TEXT.Spanish: La región desértica central contiene los minerales estratégicos. La fértil región septentrional tiene menos tierra, pero más recursos, que la meridional.
TEXT.Russian: The desert region in the middle holds the strategic minerals. The fertile region in the north has less land (but more resources) than the south.
TEXT.Japanese: The desert region in the middle holds the strategic minerals. The fertile region in the north has less land (but more resources) than the south.
TEXT.Chinese: The desert region in the middle holds the strategic minerals. The fertile region in the north has less land (but more resources) than the south.

TEXT.English: A round Pangaea where all players are guaranteed to have the most vital strategic resources within a few plots of their starting location.
TEXT.French: Une Pangée circulaire dans laquelle tous les joueurs disposent de toutes les ressources stratégiques à quelques cases de leur point de départ.
TEXT.German: Ein runder Pangäa-Kontinent, auf dem allen Spielern im Umkreis weniger Geländefelder um ihre Startstandorte die meisten lebensnotwendigen strategischen Ressourcen zur Verfügung stehen.
TEXT.Italian: Una Pangea circolare dove tutti i giocatori dispongono delle risorse strategiche fondamentali a poca distanza dal punto di partenza.
TEXT.Spanish: Una Pangea perfecta en la que todos los jugadores cuentan con los recursos estratégicos más vitales a pocas casillas de su lugar de salida.
TEXT.Russian: A round Pangaea where all players are guaranteed to have the most vital strategic resources within a few plots of their starting location.
TEXT.Japanese: A round Pangaea where all players are guaranteed to have the most vital strategic resources within a few plots of their starting location.
TEXT.Chinese: A round Pangaea where all players are guaranteed to have the most vital strategic resources within a few plots of their starting location.

TEXT.English: The result of a mad wizard's experiments, this randomly generated and fanciful world has wildly varying climates and ignores the laws of physics.
TEXT.French: C'est le résultat de l'expérience d'un sorcier fou. Ce monde fantasque et généré aléatoirement connaît plusieurs climats et ignore totalement les lois de la physique.
TEXT.German: Als Resultat des Experiments eines verrückten Magiers besitzt diese zufällig generierte phantasievolle Welt völlig unterschiedliche Klimata und ignoriert sämtliche physikalischen Naturgesetze.
TEXT.Italian: Il risultato degli esperimenti di un mago pazzo, questo mondo fantasioso, generato casualmente, possiede vari climi e ignora le leggi della fisica.
TEXT.Spanish: Este descabalado mundo generado al azar es resultado de los experimentos de un mago loco. Tiene climas que cambian de la noche a la mañana, y las leyes de la Física no van con él.
TEXT.Russian: The result of a mad wizard's experiments, this randomly generated and fanciful world has wildly varying climates and ignores the laws of physics.
TEXT.Japanese: The result of a mad wizard's experiments, this randomly generated and fanciful world has wildly varying climates and ignores the laws of physics.
TEXT.Chinese: The result of a mad wizard's experiments, this randomly generated and fanciful world has wildly varying climates and ignores the laws of physics.

TEXT.English: Each player starts in a separate region. The regions connect via land bridges to the polar hub at the map's center.
TEXT.French: Chaque joueur commence dans une région distincte. Les régions sont reliées entre elles par des bandes de terre rejoignant le noyau polaire au centre de la carte.
TEXT.German: Jeder Spieler beginnt in einer eigenen Region. Die einzelnen Regionen sind durch Landzungen mit der Polarkappe in der Mitte der Karte verbunden.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni giocatore comincia in una regione separata. Le regioni sono collegate tramite stretti passaggi al polo al centro della mappa.
TEXT.Spanish: Cada jugador empieza en una región apartada. Las regiones están comunicadas mediante puentes de tierra al casquete polar, en el centro del mapa.
TEXT.Russian: Each player starts in a separate region. The regions connect via land bridges to the polar hub at the map's center.
TEXT.Japanese: Each player starts in a separate region. The regions connect via land bridges to the polar hub at the map's center.
TEXT.Chinese: Each player starts in a separate region. The regions connect via land bridges to the polar hub at the map's center.

TEXT.English: A large sea inhabits the center, surrounded by a thick ring of land.
TEXT.French: Un vaste océan central est entouré d'un large anneau de terre.
TEXT.German: In der Mitte dieser Karte befindet sich ein großes Meer, das von einem dicken Landring umschlossen ist.
TEXT.Italian: Un ampio mare riempie il centro della mappa, circondato da uno spesso anello di terra.
TEXT.Spanish: Un gran mar puebla el centro, rodeado por un grueso anillo de tierra.
TEXT.Russian: A large sea inhabits the center, surrounded by a thick ring of land.
TEXT.Japanese: A large sea inhabits the center, surrounded by a thick ring of land.
TEXT.Chinese: A large sea inhabits the center, surrounded by a thick ring of land.

TEXT.English: Each player starts on their own randomly generated island. Extra islands (large or small) may be added.
TEXT.French: Chaque joueur commence sur une île générée aléatoirement. Des îles supplémentaires de tailles diverses peuvent également apparaître.
TEXT.German: Jeder Spieler beginnt auf einer eigenen zufällig generierten Insel. Es können zusätzliche Inseln (groß oder klein) hinzugefügt werden.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni giocatore comincia su una propria isola, generata casualmente. Possono aggiungersi delle isole extra (grosse o piccole).
TEXT.Spanish: Cada jugador empieza en una isla generada al azar. Pueden añadirse islas adicionales (mayores o menores).
TEXT.Russian: Each player starts on their own randomly generated island. Extra islands (large or small) may be added.
TEXT.Japanese: Each player starts on their own randomly generated island. Extra islands (large or small) may be added.
TEXT.Chinese: Each player starts on their own randomly generated island. Extra islands (large or small) may be added.

TEXT.English: Novelty map that randomly generates an extremely twisty maze of land and water.
TEXT.French: Une carte étrange qui génère un labyrinthe très complexe d'eau et de terre.
TEXT.German: Auf dieser neuartigen Karte wird nach dem Zufallsprinzip ein äußerst verschlungenes Labyrinth aus Land- und Wasserflächen generiert.
TEXT.Italian: Un'innovativa mappa che genera casualmente un intricato labirinto di terra e mare.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mapa novedoso que genera un laberinto muy intrincado de tierra y agua.
TEXT.Russian: Novelty map that randomly generates an extremely twisty maze of land and water.
TEXT.Japanese: Novelty map that randomly generates an extremely twisty maze of land and water.
TEXT.Chinese: Novelty map that randomly generates an extremely twisty maze of land and water.

TEXT.English: Land-based map, randomly generates half a world in the west then mirrors it exactly in the east.
TEXT.French: Cette carte "terrestre" génère aléatoirement une moitié de monde à l'ouest, qui est ensuite exactement reproduite à l'est.
TEXT.German: Bei dieser landorientierten Karte wird zunächst eine Hälfte der Welt im Westen generiert und diese wird dann im Osten exakt gespiegelt.
TEXT.Italian: Una mappa terrestre, genera casualmente mezzo mondo nella parte ovest e lo ribalta esattamente nella parte est.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mapa principalmente de tierra que genera al azar medio mundo en el oeste y lo refleja exactamente en el este.
TEXT.Russian: Land-based map, randomly generates half a world in the west then mirrors it exactly in the east.
TEXT.Japanese: Land-based map, randomly generates half a world in the west then mirrors it exactly in the east.
TEXT.Chinese: Land-based map, randomly generates half a world in the west then mirrors it exactly in the east.

TEXT.English: Each player starts in a separate region. Each region connects to its two immediate neighbors, forming a ring of land that surrounds an isolated polar region.
TEXT.French: Chaque joueur commence dans une région distincte, chacune étant reliée à ses deux voisines immédiates, le tout formant un anneau de terres entourant une région polaire centrale et isolée.
TEXT.German: Jeder Spieler beginnt in einer eigenen Region. Die einzelnen Regionen sind mit jeweils zwei unmittelbaren Nachbarregionen verbunden, bis ein Landring um eine isolierte Polarregion gebildet ist.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni giocatore comincia in una regione separata, collegata ai due vicini per formare un anello di terra che circonda una regione polare isolata.
TEXT.Spanish: Cada jugador empieza en una región apartada. Cada región está comunicada con las dos vecinas más cercanas, formando un anillo de tierra que rodea una región polar aislada.
TEXT.Russian: Each player starts in a separate region. Each region connects to its two immediate neighbors, forming a ring of land that surrounds an isolated polar region.
TEXT.Japanese: Each player starts in a separate region. Each region connects to its two immediate neighbors, forming a ring of land that surrounds an isolated polar region.
TEXT.Chinese: Each player starts in a separate region. Each region connects to its two immediate neighbors, forming a ring of land that surrounds an isolated polar region.

TEXT.English: You choose how many continents there will be.
TEXT.French: Vous choisissez le nombre de continents que comptera le monde.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie, wie viele Kontinente auf der Karte vorhanden sein sollen.
TEXT.Italian: Puoi scegliere quanti continenti saranno presenti nella mappa.
TEXT.Russian: You choose how many continents there will be.
TEXT.Japanese: You choose how many continents there will be.
TEXT.Chinese: You choose how many continents there will be.

TEXT.English: Teams are placed on opposite sides of the map with a neutral zone between them.
TEXT.French: Les équipes sont placées à l'opposé sur la carte, avec une zone neutre entre les deux.
TEXT.German: Die Teams werden auf jeweils gegenüberliegenden Seiten der Karte platziert und durch neutrale Zonen voneinander getrennt.
TEXT.Italian: Le squadre verranno posizionate su lati opposti della mappa, con una zona neutrale tra esse.
TEXT.Spanish: Los equipos se colocan en lados opuestos del mapa con una zona neutral entre ellos.
TEXT.Russian: Teams are placed on opposite sides of the map with a neutral zone between them.
TEXT.Japanese: Teams are placed on opposite sides of the map with a neutral zone between them.
TEXT.Chinese: Teams are placed on opposite sides of the map with a neutral zone between them.

TEXT.English: Worlds with a tilted planetary axis (turned on their side) have more severe summers and winters, but their overall climates are similar to standard worlds.
TEXT.French: Les mondes dont l'axe planétaire a été renversé connaissent des étés plus torrides et des hivers plus rudes, mais sont similaires aux mondes normaux.
TEXT.German: In Welten mit einer schiefen planetaren Achse (seitlich gedreht) gibt es extremere Sommer und Winter, die allgemeinen Klimabedingungen ähneln jedoch denen der Standardwelten.
TEXT.Italian: I mondi con l'asse planetario inclinato (ruotato sul fianco) hanno estati e inverni più severi, ma il clima generale è simile ai mondi normali.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mundos con un eje inclinado tienen inviernos y veranos más inclementes pero su clima en general es similar al de los mundos estándar.
TEXT.Russian: Worlds with a tilted planetary axis (turned on their side) have more severe summers and winters, but their overall climates are similar to standard worlds.
TEXT.Japanese: Worlds with a tilted planetary axis (turned on their side) have more severe summers and winters, but their overall climates are similar to standard worlds.
TEXT.Chinese: Worlds with a tilted planetary axis (turned on their side) have more severe summers and winters, but their overall climates are similar to standard worlds.

TEXT.English: Each player starts in a separate region. Regions are connected via land bridges, forming a complete wagon wheel (both ring and hub).
TEXT.French: Chaque joueur commence dans une région distincte. Ces régions sont reliées par des bandes de terre et forment une roue de chariot (la roue et le centre).
TEXT.German: Jeder Spieler beginnt in einer eigenen Region. Die einzelnen Regionen sind durch Landzungen wagenradförmig (mit Speichen und Nabe) miteinander verbunden.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni giocatore comincia in una regione separata, collegata alle altre con uno stretto passaggio, a formare un cerchio completo.
TEXT.Spanish: Cada jugador empieza en una región apartada. Las regiones están comunicadas mediante puentes de tierra que forman una rueda de carro (van tanto al centro como a la periferia).
TEXT.Russian: Each player starts in a separate region. Regions are connected via land bridges, forming a complete wagon wheel (both ring and hub).
TEXT.Japanese: Each player starts in a separate region. Regions are connected via land bridges, forming a complete wagon wheel (both ring and hub).
TEXT.Chinese: Each player starts in a separate region. Regions are connected via land bridges, forming a complete wagon wheel (both ring and hub).

TEXT.English: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all land plots, a foundation for crafting your own land-heavy maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.French: Modèle pour l'éditeur de mondes : carte vierge remplie de cases de terre, une base parfaite pour créer vos propres cartes dans l'éditeur de mondes.
TEXT.German: Weltenbauer-Vorlage: Eine leere Karte mit allen Land-Geländefeldern als Grundlage für die Gestaltung eigener landorientierter Karten mit dem Weltenbauer.
TEXT.Italian: Modello editor: mappa vuota di terreno pieno, una base per creare le tue mappe terrestri con l'editor.
TEXT.Spanish: La plantilla del Creador de mundos es un mapa vacío con todas las casillas de tierra, una base para que crees tus propios mapas continentales con el Creador de mundos.
TEXT.Russian: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all land plots, a foundation for crafting your own land-heavy maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.Japanese: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all land plots, a foundation for crafting your own land-heavy maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.Chinese: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all land plots, a foundation for crafting your own land-heavy maps in the Worldbuilder.

TEXT.English: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all water plots, a foundation for crafting your own oceanic maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.French: Modèle pour l'éditeur de mondes : carte vierge remplie de cases de mer, une base parfaite pour créer vos propres cartes marines dans l'éditeur de mondes.
TEXT.German: Weltenbauer-Vorlage: Eine leere Karte mit allen Wasser-Geländefeldern als Grundlage für die Gestaltung eigener wasserorientierter Karten mit dem Weltenbauer.
TEXT.Italian: Modello editor: mappa vuota di mare pieno, una base per creare le tue mappe oceaniche con l'editor.
TEXT.Spanish: La plantilla del Creador de mundos es un mapa vacío con todas las casillas de agua, una base para que crees tus propios mapas oceánicos con el Creador de mundos.
TEXT.Russian: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all water plots, a foundation for crafting your own oceanic maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.Japanese: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all water plots, a foundation for crafting your own oceanic maps in the Worldbuilder.
TEXT.Chinese: Worldbuilder Template: empty map with all water plots, a foundation for crafting your own oceanic maps in the Worldbuilder.

TEXT.English: The network socket encountered an error and was closed. Disconnected.

TEXT.French: Plusieurs profils correspondants ont été trouvés. Affinez vos critères de recherche.
TEXT.German: Es wurden mehrere übereinstimmende Profile gefunden. Geben Sie bitte weitere Suchkriterien an.
TEXT.Italian: Trovati risultati multipli. Modifica il tuo criterio di ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Se han encontrado varios perfiles que coinciden. Hay que reducir los criterios de búsqueda.
TEXT.Russian: Multiple matching profiles were found. Please refine your search criteria.
TEXT.Japanese: Multiple matching profiles were found. Please refine your search criteria.
TEXT.Chinese: Multiple matching profiles were found. Please refine your search criteria.

TEXT.English: Unable to act while downloading the patch.
TEXT.French: Impossible d'agir pendant le chargement du patch.
TEXT.German: Während des Patch-Downloads sind keine weiteren Aktivitäten möglich.
TEXT.Italian: Impossibile durante il download della patch.
TEXT.Spanish: No se pueden llevar a cabo otras acciones mientras se descarga el parche.
TEXT.Russian: Unable to act while downloading the patch.
TEXT.Japanese: Unable to act while downloading the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: Unable to act while downloading the patch.

TEXT.English: Please enter the required password for this game.
TEXT.French: Saisissez le mot de passe requis pour cette partie.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie ein Kennwort für dieses Spiel ein.
TEXT.Italian: Inserire una password per partecipare a questa partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Introduce la contraseña necesaria para la partida.
TEXT.Russian: Please enter the required password for this game.
TEXT.Japanese: Please enter the required password for this game.
TEXT.Chinese: Please enter the required password for this game.

TEXT.English: Enter a password to protect your game.[NEWLINE](Leave it blank to waive password protection.)
TEXT.French: Saisissez un mot de passe pour protéger votre partie.[NEWLINE](Ne saisissez aucun mot de passe si vous ne souhaitez pas en utiliser).
TEXT.German: Geben Sie ein Kennwort ein, um Ihr Spiel vor unbefugtem Zugriff zu schützen.[NEWLINE](Lassen Sie die Kennworteingabe leer, wenn Sie kein Kennwort nutzen wollen.)
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci una password per proteggere la tua partita.[NEWLINE](Lascia lo spazio vuoto per non usare password).
TEXT.Spanish: Introduce una contraseña para proteger la partida.[NEWLINE]Dejar en blanco para descartar la protección mediante contraseña.
TEXT.Russian: Enter a password to protect your game.[NEWLINE](Leave it blank to waive password protection.)
TEXT.Japanese: Enter a password to protect your game.[NEWLINE](Leave it blank to waive password protection.)
TEXT.Chinese: Enter a password to protect your game.[NEWLINE](Leave it blank to waive password protection.)

TEXT.English: No Barbarians or Animals will appear
TEXT.French: Aucun barbare ou animal n'apparaîtra sur la carte.
TEXT.German: Es erscheinen keine Barbaren oder Tiere
TEXT.Spanish: No aparecerán ni bárbaros ni animales.
TEXT.Russian: No Barbarians or Animals will appear
TEXT.Japanese: No Barbarians or Animals will appear
TEXT.Chinese: No Barbarians or Animals will appear

TEXT.English: The save has been placed in your PBEM folder. Please send it to %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] If you set your e-mail address and SMTP server, saves can be sent from within the game.
TEXT.French: La sauvegarde a été enregistrée dans votre répertoire PBEM. Veuillez l'envoyer à %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] Si vous avez spécifié une adresse e-mail et un serveur SMTP, les sauvegardes peuvent être envoyées depuis le jeu.
TEXT.German: Der Spielstand wurde in Ihrem PBEM-Verzeichnis abgelegt. Senden Sie ihn bitte an %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] Wenn Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse und den SMTP-Server einstellen, können Spielstand-Dateien aus dem Spiel heraus versendet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Il salvataggio è stato effettuato nella cartella PBEM. Spediscilo a %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] Se imposti il tuo indirizzo e-mail e il server SMTP, i salvataggi possono essere spediti dal gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: La partida guardada se ha colocado en tu carpeta PBEM. Envíasela a %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] Si fijas una dirección de e-mail y un servidor SMTP, las partidas guardadas podrán enviarse desde el juego.
TEXT.Russian: The save has been placed in your PBEM folder. Please send it to %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] If you set your e-mail address and SMTP server, saves can be sent from within the game.
TEXT.Japanese: The save has been placed in your PBEM folder. Please send it to %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] If you set your e-mail address and SMTP server, saves can be sent from within the game.
TEXT.Chinese: The save has been placed in your PBEM folder. Please send it to %s1_leader.[NEWLINE] If you set your e-mail address and SMTP server, saves can be sent from within the game.

TEXT.English: Do you wish to keep this resolution?

TEXT.Japanese: Do you wish to keep this resolution?

TEXT.French: Lancement du moteur de messages impossible.

TEXT.English: This scenario requires the "%s1_ModName" mod.[NEWLINE]The game must restart to load this mod.

TEXT.German: Dieses Szenario erfordert das "%s1_ModName"-Mod.[NEWLINE]Das Spiel muss zum Laden dieses Mods neu gestartet werden.

TEXT.English: The game must restart to load this mod.
TEXT.French: Le jeu doit être relancé pour pouvoir charger ce mod.

TEXT.Italian: Per caricare questo mod, il gioco deve essere riavviato.
TEXT.Spanish: El juego debe reiniciarse para cargar este mod.
TEXT.Russian: The game must restart to load this mod.
TEXT.Japanese: The game must restart to load this mod.
TEXT.Chinese: The game must restart to load this mod.

TEXT.English: There are no updates available at this time.
TEXT.French: Aucune mise à jour n'est disponible pour l'instant.
TEXT.German: Es sind zurzeit keine Updates verfügbar.

TEXT.Spanish: En este momento no hay disponible ninguna actualización.

TEXT.Chinese: There are no updates available at this time.

TEXT.English: You may not proceed until the patching process is complete.
TEXT.French: Vous devez attendre la fin de l'installation du patch.
TEXT.German: Sie können erst nach Abschluss des Patching-Vorgangs fortfahren.
TEXT.Italian: Non puoi continuare finché il processo di patch non è terminato.
TEXT.Spanish: No puedes continuar hasta que se haya aplicado el parche.
TEXT.Russian: You may not proceed until the patching process is complete.
TEXT.Japanese: You may not proceed until the patching process is complete.
TEXT.Chinese: You may not proceed until the patching process is complete.

TEXT.English: An error was encountered while checking for updates.
TEXT.French: Une erreur s'est produite lors de la recherche de mise à jour.
TEXT.German: Bei der Update-Überprüfung ist ein Fehler aufgetreten.
TEXT.Italian: Durante la verifica degli aggiornamenti si è rilevato un errore.
TEXT.Spanish: Se ha producido un error al comprobar las actualizaciones.
TEXT.Russian: An error was encountered while checking for updates.
TEXT.Japanese: An error was encountered while checking for updates.

TEXT.French: Une mise à jour est déjà en cours.

TEXT.Italian: In attesa delle scelte delle civiltà...

TEXT.Spanish: Confirmando secuencia de comandos del mapa

TEXT.English: Could not load initial game data.
TEXT.French: Chargement des données initiales du jeu impossible.
TEXT.German: Ursprüngliche Spieldaten konnten nicht geladen werden.
TEXT.Italian: Impossibile caricare i dati iniziali di gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: No se han podido cargar los datos iniciales del juego.
TEXT.Russian: Could not load initial game data.
TEXT.Japanese: Could not load initial game data.
TEXT.Chinese: Could not load initial game data.

TEXT.English: Game hosting failed. Check network connections.
TEXT.French: Echec de l'hébergement de la partie. Vérifiez vos connexions réseau.
TEXT.German: Spiel-Hosting fehlgeschlagen. Prüfen Sie die Netzwerkverbindungen.
TEXT.Italian: Host della partita fallito. Controlla le connessione di rete.
TEXT.Spanish: No se ha podido alojar la partida. Comprueba la conexión de red.
TEXT.Russian: Game hosting failed. Check network connections.
TEXT.Japanese: Game hosting failed. Check network connections.
TEXT.Chinese: Game hosting failed. Check network connections.

TEXT.Spanish: No se ha podido abrir el archivo de repetición.

TEXT.Chinese: Failed to open the replay file.

TEXT.French: Erreur dans la salle de préparation
TEXT.Spanish: Error de la sala de comunicaciones

TEXT.English: An error has occurred with the staging room on the server.
TEXT.French: Une erreur est survenue avec la salle de préparation sur le serveur.

TEXT.French: Le fichier de script de la carte choisie est introuvable.

TEXT.English: Cannot launch game until all players are ready.
TEXT.French: La partie ne peut pas être lancée tant que tous les joueurs ne sont pas prêts.
TEXT.German: Das Spiel kann erst gestartet werden, wenn alle Spieler bereit sind.
TEXT.Italian: Impossibile avviare la partita finché tutti i giocatori non pronti.
TEXT.Spanish: No se puede iniciar la partida hasta que estén listos todos los jugadores.
TEXT.Russian: Cannot launch game until all players are ready.
TEXT.Japanese: Cannot launch game until all players are ready.

TEXT.French: Patientez... Transfert des données du jeu en cours.

TEXT.English: The patch has been successfully downloaded.[NEWLINE]Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.French: Le patch a été chargé avec succès.[NEWLINE]Cliquez sur OK pour fermer le jeu et installer le patch.
TEXT.German: Der Patch wurde erfolgreich heruntergeladen.[NEWLINE]Klicken Sie auf OK, um das Spiel zu beenden und den Patch zu installieren.
TEXT.Italian: La patch è stata scaricata con successo.[NEWLINE]Premi OK per chiudere il gioco e installare la patch.
TEXT.Spanish: El parche se ha descargado con éxito.[NEWLINE]Pulsa "Aceptar" para elegir la partida e instalar el parche.
TEXT.Russian: The patch has been successfully downloaded.[NEWLINE]Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.Japanese: The patch has been successfully downloaded.[NEWLINE]Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: The patch has been successfully downloaded.[NEWLINE]Press OK to close the game and install the patch.

TEXT.English: A choice will be made at random. Selecting this option proves you are hard.
TEXT.French: Un choix sera fait aléatoirement. Le choix de cette option prouve que vous avez du cran.
TEXT.German: Es wird eine zufällige Wahl getroffen. Diese Option eignet sich nur für echte Draufgänger!

TEXT.Chinese: We are waiting for %s1_Names to reconnect to the game.[NEWLINE]If you would like to stop waiting, please vote on how to proceed.

TEXT.French: Certains votes sont toujours en attente.
TEXT.German: Es stehen noch immer Stimmabgaben aus.

TEXT.Spanish: La votación ha acabado en empate.
La votación ha de ser unánime.

TEXT.English: The players have chosen to continue to wait.
TEXT.French: Les joueurs ont voté pour la poursuite de l'attente.
TEXT.German: Die Spieler haben beschlossen zu warten.
TEXT.Italian: I giocatori hanno scelto di continuare ad aspettare.
TEXT.Spanish: Los jugadores han decidido seguir esperando.
TEXT.Russian: The players have chosen to continue to wait.
TEXT.Japanese: The players have chosen to continue to wait.
TEXT.Chinese: The players have chosen to continue to wait.

TEXT.English: Enter your existing GameSpy ID and password to login.
TEXT.French: Saisissez votre identifiant et votre mot de passe GameSpy pour vous connecter.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie Ihren vorhandenen GameSpy-Benutzernamen und Ihr Kennwort ein, um sich einzuloggen.
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il tuo GameSpy ID esistente e la password per effettuare il login.
TEXT.Spanish: Introduce tu ID de GameSpy y tu contraseña para iniciar sesión.
TEXT.Russian: Enter your existing GameSpy ID and password to login.
TEXT.Japanese: Enter your existing GameSpy ID and password to login.
TEXT.Chinese: Enter your existing GameSpy ID and password to login.

TEXT.English: Enter your email address, desired user name, and password to create a new GameSpy account.
TEXT.French: Saisissez votre adresse e-mail, votre nom d'utilisateur et votre mot de passe pour créer un nouveau compte GameSpy.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie zum Anlegen eines neuen GameSpy-Accounts Ihre E-Mail-Adresse, den gewünschten Benutzernamen und ein Kennwort ein.
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il tuo indirizzo e-mail, lo username desiderato e la password per creare un nuovo account di GameSpy.
TEXT.Spanish: Introduce tu dirección de e-mail, el nombre de usuario que desees y la contraseña para crear una nueva cuenta de GameSpy.
TEXT.Russian: Enter your email address, desired user name, and password to create a new GameSpy account.
TEXT.Japanese: Enter your email address, desired user name, and password to create a new GameSpy account.
TEXT.Chinese: Enter your email address, desired user name, and password to create a new GameSpy account.

TEXT.English: Once you add a person to your buddy list, you can send them direct messages.
TEXT.French: Si vous ajoutez un joueur à votre liste d'amis, vous pourrez lui envoyer directement des messages.
TEXT.German: Nach dem Hinzufügen einer Person zu Ihrer Freundesliste können Sie sofort Nachrichten an sie versenden.
TEXT.Italian: Quando aggiungi una persona alla lista amici, puoi inviare messaggi personali diretti.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando agregas a alguien a la lista de amigos, puedes enviarle mensajes directos.
TEXT.Russian: Once you add a person to your buddy list, you can send them direct messages.
TEXT.Japanese: Once you add a person to your buddy list, you can send them direct messages.
TEXT.Chinese: Once you add a person to your buddy list, you can send them direct messages.

TEXT.English: Are you sure you want to remove this buddy?
TEXT.French: Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer cet ami de votre liste ?
TEXT.German: Soll dieser Freund wirklich aus der Liste entfernt werden?
TEXT.Italian: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare questo amico?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Seguro que quieres quitar a este amigo?
TEXT.Russian: Are you sure you want to remove this buddy?
TEXT.Japanese: Are you sure you want to remove this buddy?
TEXT.Chinese: Are you sure you want to remove this buddy?

TEXT.English: To directly chat with a member, they must first be added to your buddy list. Do you want to add %s1_Name as a buddy now?
TEXT.French: Pour discuter directement avec un membre, vous devez d'abord l'ajouter à votre liste d'amis. Voulez-vous ajouter %s1_Name à votre liste d'amis ?
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie direkt mit anderen Mitgliedern chatten wollen, müssen Sie diese in Ihre Freundesliste aufnehmen. Wollen Sie [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1_Name[COLOR_REVERT] zu Ihrer Freundesliste hinzufügen?
TEXT.Italian: Per chattare direttamente con un membro, prima devi aggiungerlo alla tua lista amici. Vuoi aggiungere %s1_Name come amico?
TEXT.Spanish: Para charlar directamente con un miembro, primero debes agregarlo a tu lista de amigos. ¿Quieres agregar a %s1_Name como amigo?
TEXT.Russian: To directly chat with a member, they must first be added to your buddy list. Do you want to add %s1_Name as a buddy now?
TEXT.Japanese: To directly chat with a member, they must first be added to your buddy list. Do you want to add %s1_Name as a buddy now?
TEXT.Chinese: To directly chat with a member, they must first be added to your buddy list. Do you want to add %s1_Name as a buddy now?

TEXT.English: An update is available. Would you like to get it?
TEXT.French: Une mise à jour est disponible. Voulez-vous la télécharger ?
TEXT.German: Es ist ein Update verfügbar. Wollen Sie es herunterladen?
TEXT.Italian: È disponibile una patch... vuoi scaricarla?
TEXT.Russian: An update is available. Would you like to get it?
TEXT.Japanese: An update is available. Would you like to get it?
TEXT.Chinese: An update is available. Would you like to get it?

TEXT.English: You must update your game before proceeding.
TEXT.French: Vous devez mettre à jour votre version du jeu avant de continuer.
TEXT.German: Sie müssen Ihr Spiel aktualisieren, bevor Sie fortfahren können.
TEXT.Italian: Prima di procedere devi aggiornare il gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: Debes actualizar la partida antes de continuar.
TEXT.Russian: You must update your game before proceeding.
TEXT.Japanese: You must update your game before proceeding.
TEXT.Chinese: You must update your game before proceeding.

TEXT.English: The patch has been successfully downloaded. Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.French: Le patch a été chargé avec succès. Cliquez sur OK pour fermer le jeu et installer le patch.
TEXT.German: Der Patch wurde erfolgreich heruntergeladen. Klicken Sie auf OK, um das Spiel zu beenden und den Patch zu installieren.
TEXT.Italian: La patch è stata scaricata con successo. Premi OK per chiudere il gioco e installare la patch.
TEXT.Spanish: El parche se ha descargado con éxito. Pulsa "Aceptar" para elegir la partida e instalar el parche.
TEXT.Russian: The patch has been successfully downloaded. Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.Japanese: The patch has been successfully downloaded. Press OK to close the game and install the patch.
TEXT.Chinese: The patch has been successfully downloaded. Press OK to close the game and install the patch.

TEXT.English: The patch failed to downloaded successfully.
TEXT.French: Le téléchargement du patch a échoué.
TEXT.German: Der Patch konnte nicht heruntergeladen werden.
TEXT.Spanish: El parche no se ha podido descargar con éxito.
TEXT.Russian: The patch failed to downloaded successfully.
TEXT.Japanese: The patch failed to downloaded successfully.
TEXT.Chinese: The patch failed to downloaded successfully.

TEXT.French: Mot de passe de la partie

TEXT.English: Please enter the required password for this game.
TEXT.French: Saisissez le mot de passe requis pour cette partie.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie bitte das Kennwort für dieses Spiel ein.
TEXT.Italian: Inserire una password per partecipare a questa partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Introduce la contraseña necesaria para la partida.
TEXT.Russian: Please enter the required password for this game.
TEXT.Japanese: Please enter the required password for this game.
TEXT.Chinese: Please enter the required password for this game.

TEXT.French: Mot de passe de la partie

TEXT.English: Enter a password if you'd like to protect your game.[NEWLINE]Leave the password blank to waive protection.
TEXT.French: Saisissez un mot de passe pour protéger votre partie.[NEWLINE]Ne saisissez aucun mot de passe si vous ne souhaitez aucune protection.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie ein Kennwort ein, um Ihr Spiel vor unbefugtem Zugriff zu schützen.[NEWLINE]Oder lassen Sie die Kennworteingabe leer, wenn Sie kein Kennwort nutzen wollen.
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci una password se vuoi proteggere la tua partita.[NEWLINE]Lascia lo spazio bianco per evitare protezioni.
TEXT.Spanish: Introduce una contraseña si deseas proteger la partida.[NEWLINE]Déjala en blanco para descartar la protección.
TEXT.Russian: Enter a password if you'd like to protect your game.[NEWLINE]Leave the password blank to waive protection.
TEXT.Japanese: Enter a password if you'd like to protect your game.[NEWLINE]Leave the password blank to waive protection.
TEXT.Chinese: Enter a password if you'd like to protect your game.[NEWLINE]Leave the password blank to waive protection.

TEXT.English: When trading for a peace treaty, only one player may offer items to another player. Only gifts may be offered as payment for ending war, no trades can be made.
TEXT.French: Lors de la négociation d'un traité de paix, seul l'un des joueurs peut offrir quelque chose à l'autre. Pour faire la paix, seuls les présents sont possibles, aucun échange ne peut être conclu.
TEXT.German: Beim Aushandeln eines Friedensvertrags bietet der anfragende Spieler dem anderen Spieler eine Gegenleistung an. Es findet kein beidseitiger Handel statt und es können ausschließlich Schenkungen angeboten werden.
TEXT.Italian: Quando tratti la pace, solo un giocatore può offrirla a un altro. Come pagamento per il termine di una guerra, sono accettati solamente dei doni e non sono permesse azioni commerciali.
TEXT.Spanish: Al realizar un intercambio para alcanzar un tratado de paz, solo uno de los jugadores puede ofrecerle cosas al otro. Solo se pueden ofrecer regalos como pago para poner fin a la guerra, no se pueden realizar intercambios.
TEXT.Russian: When trading for a peace treaty, only one player may offer items to another player. Only gifts may be offered as payment for ending war, no trades can be made.
TEXT.Japanese: When trading for a peace treaty, only one player may offer items to another player. Only gifts may be offered as payment for ending war, no trades can be made.
TEXT.Chinese: When trading for a peace treaty, only one player may offer items to another player. Only gifts may be offered as payment for ending war, no trades can be made.

TEXT.English: Your machine is below recommended specifications. The graphic settings were altered to accomodate this, however, you may experience performance issues.
TEXT.French: Votre machine ne correspond pas à la configuration recommandée. Les paramètres graphiques ont été modifiés pour pallier ce problème, mais les performances du programme risquent d'en souffrir.
TEXT.German: Ihr Computer entspricht nicht den empfohlenen Systemspezifikationen. Die Grafikeinstellungen wurden entsprechend angepasst, es könnten jedoch Performance-Probleme auftreten.
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo computer è al di sotto dei requisiti consigliati. Le impostazioni grafiche sono state alterate di conseguenza ma, tuttavia, potrai avere dei problemi di prestazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: El ordenador no cumple los requisitos recomendados. Se ha modificado la configuración gráfica en consecuencia, pero aun así es posible que se experimenten problemas de rendimiento.

TEXT.English: This scenario begins the world in the High Middle Ages. While the Americas are still almost empty, in the Old World the Crusades and the Mongol invasion are about to start.
TEXT.French: Ce scénario commence vers la fin du Moyen-Age. Les Amériques sont encore presque vides, mais dans l'Ancien Monde, les croisades et l'invasion des Mongols vont bientôt commencer.
TEXT.German: Dieses Szenario spielt im Hochmittelalter. Während der amerikanische Kontinent noch nahezu unerschlossen ist, steht die Alte Welt kurz vor den Kreuzzügen und der Invasion der Mongolen.
TEXT.Italian: Questo scenario inizia nel mondo dell'Alto Medioevo; mentre le Americhe sono ancora poco popolate, nel Vecchio Continente infuriano le crociate e l'invasione Mongola sta per iniziare.
TEXT.Spanish: Este escenario muestra el mundo en la Alta Edad Media. Aunque las Américas prácticamente están vacías, en el Viejo Mundo están a punto de empezar las Cruzadas y la invasión de los mongoles.
TEXT.Russian: This scenario begins the world in the High Middle Ages. While the Americas are still almost empty, in the Old World the Crusades and the Mongol invasion are about to start.
TEXT.Japanese: This scenario begins the world in the High Middle Ages. While the Americas are still almost empty, in the Old World the Crusades and the Mongol invasion are about to start.
TEXT.Chinese: This scenario begins the world in the High Middle Ages. While the Americas are still almost empty, in the Old World the Crusades and the Mongol invasion are about to start.

TEXT.English: What if civilizations started developing 20000 years before present?
TEXT.French: Et si les civilisations s'étaient développées il y a 2000 ans ?
TEXT.German: Was wäre wohl, wenn die Entwicklung der Zivilisationen bereits 20.000 Jahre vor der Gegenwart begonnen hätte?
TEXT.Italian: Cosa sarebbe successo se le civiltà avessero cominciato a svilupparsi 20.000 anni fa?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Y si las civilizaciones hubieran empezado a desarrollarse hace 20.000 años?
TEXT.Russian: What if civilizations started developing 20000 years before present?
TEXT.Japanese: What if civilizations started developing 20000 years before present?
TEXT.Chinese: What if civilizations started developing 20000 years before present?

TEXT.English: This scenario begins in 600BC and lets you control one of the three rising powers of the Classical Mediterranean.
TEXT.French: Ce scénario commence en 600 av. JC et vous contrôlez l'un des trois grands empires méditerranéens de l'Antiquité.
TEXT.German: Dieses Szenario beginnt im Jahr 600 vor Christus und bietet Ihnen die Möglichkeit, eine von drei aufstrebenden Nationen im Mittelmeerraum zu beherrschen.
TEXT.Italian: Questo scenario inizia nel 600 a. C. e ti permette di controllare una delle tre potenze in ascesa nel Mediterraneo classico.
TEXT.Spanish: Este escenario tiene lugar en el 600 a. C. y te permite controlar una de las potencias incipientes del Mediterráneo en la época clásica.
TEXT.Russian: This scenario begins in 600BC and lets you control one of the three rising powers of the Classical Mediterranean.
TEXT.Japanese: This scenario begins in 600BC and lets you control one of the three rising powers of the Classical Mediterranean.
TEXT.Chinese: This scenario begins in 600BC and lets you control one of the three rising powers of the Classical Mediterranean.

TEXT.English: In 1775 the 13 British Colonies in North America broke out in open revolution against the empire and sought to forge their own path alone as an independent nation. Citing exploitive practices by the British Empire, the Colonists were angered over what they saw as unjust taxation, lack of representation in the British government, and in the case of some, loss of potential fortunes which could be made trading with other parts of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Following the Battles at Lexington, Concord and Bunker Hill the British are bottled up in Boston by the newly formed Colonial Continental Army led by General George Washington. However, the Colonies are fragile and have nowhere near the resources of a worldwide empire, so the situation is dangerous for both sides. Shall you help lead the Colonies into freedom or fight to keep the Empire intact?
TEXT.French: En 1775, les 13 colonies britanniques d'Amérique du Nord se soulèvent contre l'empire et cherchent à tracer leur propre voie en tant que nation indépendante. Se sentant exploités par l'empire britannique, les colons se révoltent contre les taxes considérées comme abusives, l'absence de représentation au sein du gouvernement britannique et, pour certains, la perte de fortunes potentielles qui auraient pu êtres bâties en commerçant avec d'autres parties du monde.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Suite aux batailles de Lexington, Concord et Bunker Hill, les troupes britanniques se retrouvent acculées dans la ville de Boston par la jeune Armée Coloniale Continentale conduite par le Général George Washington. Mais les colonies sont encore fragiles et ne disposent pas des vastes ressources de l'empire mondial auquel elles s'opposent. La situation est donc tendue pour les deux camps. Aiderez-vous les colonies à atteindre la liberté ou combattrez-vous pour préserver l'unité de l'empire ?
TEXT.Italian: Nel 1775, le 13 colonie inglesi del Nord America si rivoltarono apertamente contro l'impero e cercarono di creare da soli la propria strada verso una nazione indipendente. Citando i documenti amministrativi dell'Impero Inglese, i coloniali erano infuriati dalle tassazioni ingiuste, da una mancanza di rappresentanza nel governo britannico e, in alcuni casi, dalla perdita di profitto ottenibile tramite il commercio con altre parti del mondo.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Dopo le battaglie di Lexington, Concord e Bunker Hill, gli Inglesi si ritrovarono intrappolati a Boston dal nuovo Esercito Continentale dei coloniali, guidato da George Washington. Tuttavia, i coloniali erano instabili e non disponevano di risorse paragonabili a quelle di un impero mondiale, perciò la situazione era pericolosa per entrambe le fazioni. Vuoi guidare i coloniali verso l'indipendenza oppure lottare per mantenere intatto l'Impero Inglese?
TEXT.Spanish: En 1775, las trece colonias británicas en Norteamérica se levantaron en una revolución abierta contra el imperio con la intención de recorrer su propio camino como nación independiente. Clamando contra las prácticas explotadoras de la metrópoli, los colonos estaban enojados por lo que percibían como un sistema tributario injusto, falta de representación en el gobierno británico y, en algunos casos, pérdida de fortunas potenciales que podrían ganarse comerciando con otros lugares del mundo.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Tras las batallas de Lexington, Concord y Bunker Hill, los británicos se encuentran atrapados en Boston por el ejército continental, recién fundado, que lidera el general George Washington. No obstante, las colonias son frágiles y los recursos que tienen no pueden comparase ni por asomo con los de una potencia mundial, por lo que la situación es peligrosa para ambos bandos. ¿Ayudaréis a conducir a las colonias a la libertad? ¿O lucharéis por mantener el imperio intacto?
TEXT.Russian: In 1775 the 13 British Colonies in North America broke out in open revolution against the empire and sought to forge their own path alone as an independent nation. Citing exploitive practices by the British Empire, the Colonists were angered over what they saw as unjust taxation, lack of representation in the British government, and in the case of some, loss of potential fortunes which could be made trading with other parts of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Following the Battles at Lexington, Concord and Bunker Hill the British are bottled up in Boston by the newly formed Colonial Continental Army led by General George Washington. However, the Colonies are fragile and have nowhere near the resources of a worldwide empire, so the situation is dangerous for both sides. Shall you help lead the Colonies into freedom or fight to keep the Empire intact?
